meta.name: viewport
description
meta.content: Established in 1883, Terrell Independent School District has a proud history of providing quality education to students. It is our belief that the future of our community, state, and nation hinges on the quality of the students being educated by our school system.

Established in 1883, Terrell Independent School District has a proud history of providing quality education to students. It is our belief that the future of our community, state, and nation hinges on the quality of the students being educated by our school system.

span.span: TISD announced that all campuses will be closed indefinitely. Click here for more info on COVID-19.

span.span: TISD has developed an at-home learning webpage with suggested daily schedules and free online resources. This webpage will be continually updated. Please check back often.

a.span: CLICK HERE TO VISIT AT-HOME LEARNING WEBPAGE

div.data-state: defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected clipImage noTransition normal link

div.span: TISD welcome former Pulitzer Prize winner, Dr. Melanie Magee, as the new Deputy Superintendent of Leading and Learning. Dr. Magee also makes District history by becoming TISD's first female African-American Superintendent. Click the image above to read more.

div.data-state: defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected clipImage noTransition normal link

div.span: TISD welcomes Ms. Tonya Tillman as the new Assistant Superintendent for Business & Support Services​. Tillman joins TISD from Carrollton-Farmers Branch ISD, where she has served as the Associate Superintendent for Business Services since 2016. Click the image above to read the full story.

div.data-state: defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected clipImage noTransition normal link

div.span: The health, safety, and well-being of our students and staff are our top priority. We continue to closely monitor the situation surrounding COVID-19. Stay up-to-date with the most current District updates, closures, and announcements by clicking the image above.

a.span: CLICK HERE FOR MORE TISD NEWS

What do you want to see next on the farm?","duration":"PT1M10S","keywords":["Education"]},{"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ms. Lytle and Ms. Gould On The Farm","thumbnailUrl":"//i.ytimg.com/vi/9uimObQRXLY/mqdefault.jpg","image":"//i.ytimg.com/vi/9uimObQRXLY/mqdefault.jpg","height":270,"width":480,"embedUrl":"//www.youtube.com/embed/9uimObQRXLY","description":"Follow along with Ms. Lytle and Ms. Gould on their speech and vocabulary adventues on the farm!","duration":"PT47S","keywords":["Education"]},{"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"VideoObject","name":"Books and Badges with Officer Chuy Buckle","thumbnailUrl":"//i.ytimg.com/vi/WiID7aQubDE/mqdefault.jpg","image":"//i.ytimg.com/vi/WiID7aQubDE/mqdefault.jpg","height":270,"width":480,"embedUrl":"//www.youtube.com/embed/WiID7aQubDE","description":"Terrell ISD Police Officers have a wonderful program called Books and Badges, where they visit our elementary campuses to read stories to our students.
